Read in data
```{r}
#read in files
X999Excel <- read_excel("~/Downloads/999Excel.xlsx") #, col_names = TRUE)
X999Excel <- read_excel("~/Downloads/952Excel.xlsx", col_names = TRUE)


## Rename df headers
head <- X999Excel[1,]
head
colnames(X999Excel) = head
X999Excel <- X999Excel[-1,]

view(X999Excel)

df <- select(X999Excel,
             Subject, Group, SessionDate, SessionStartDateTimeUtc, Block, Block1:Block3.Sample, 
             DispStpRTB1.DEVICE:EmotionTask)


view(X999Excel)
df
block1 <- df %>%
  filter(!is.na(Block1))
block2 <- df %>%
  filter(!is.na(Block2))
block3 <- df %>%
  filter(!is.na(Block3))

view(block1)

```

library(tidyverse)

# A function to prepare all eprime data simultaneously
reduce_wm <- function(wm_path) {
  # Read in a text file generated by Eprime
  wm_lines <- read_eprime(wm_path)
  # Convert lines from an Eprime file into EprimeFrame objects
  wm_frames <- FrameList(wm_lines)
  # Make it a data frame.
  experiment_df <- to_data_frame(wm_frames)
  # Select the columns we want for a tibble called "dat".
}
